entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is a student who is being warned by Professor Trelawney. She is described as giving a startled look at Ron, who is right behind her.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a red-haired man who is being pointed out by Professor Trelawney. He is described as being right behind Parvati Patil.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is the teacher who is making predictions about the future. She is described as seeming unaware of the tense silence that follows her pronouncement.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is a student who is being asked by Professor Trelawney to pass her the largest silver teapot. She is described as looking relieved.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney warns Parvati Patil about a red-haired man. This is described in the text as 'beware a red-haired man'.
Professor Trelawney warns about Ron, describing him as a red-haired man. This is described in the text as 'beware a red-haired man'.
Professor Trelawney asks Lavender Brown for help by asking her to pass the largest silver teapot. This is described in the text as 'I wonder, dear, if you could pass me the largest silver teapot?'
